actions.name: Tera Shift
actions.description: Effect: The user enters its Terastal Forme, and this Ability is replaced with Tera Shell. It may also take this form as a Simple Action during one if its Activations.

system.description: Effect: The user enters its Terastal Forme, and this Ability is replaced with Tera Shell. It may also take this form as a Simple Action during one if its Activations.
